alert.note: Alert for Ceiba; Naguabo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 04 at 6:11PM ADT until September 04 at 7:30PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM AST THIS EVENING FOR CEIBA AND NAGUABO COUNTIES... At 511 PM AST, U.S.G.S. River Gauges are reporting that the Rio Blanco in Naguabo ir our of its banks, and emergency managers have reported flood in the roads. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen, and additional light to moderate rain is possible in the next hour. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
